title: [SOLVED]820-3536 chime with backlight but no image
message:
User claims it suddenly flashed a white screen then stopped, when turning it on now it fanspins, chimes, backlight comes on but no image internal/external.
CPU gets hot but capslock doesnt work. Ideas?

Tried unplugging everything except dcin and screen, PRAM and SMC reset, same situation

No evidence of liquid or drops

title: [SOLVED]820-3536 chime with backlight but no image
[SOLVED]820-3536 chime with backlight but no image
message: Is backlight on screen white screen? I would go with bad LCD more than likely

title: [SOLVED]820-3536 chime with backlight but no image
message:
Tried known working lcd same, black screen with backlight

Also if Bad LCD wouldnt external video work? and capslock

title: [SOLVED]820-3536 chime with backlight but no image
message: Removed SSD? Black screen with backlight is kind of the normal boot up situation before ? or Apple logo.

title: [SOLVED]820-3536 chime with backlight but no image
message: Tried with and without SSD, Question mark never shows

title: [SOLVED]820-3536 chime with backlight but no image
message: Possibly corrupt ROM. Swap with donor board, be sure to keep original for ME region transfer!

title: [SOLVED]820-3536 chime with backlight but no image
message: Replaced U6100 from donor, now boots 10sec after pressing power. Do I now read original ROM and transfer to donor chip?

title: [SOLVED]820-3536 chime with backlight but no image
message:
Is this a chip from a China donor or from your own pile, is it from 3536 or 3476, could cause 4GB/8GB/16GB problems.
Upload both dumps here and I can transfer over the ME region and possibly serial number.

title: [SOLVED]820-3536 chime with backlight but no image
message:
Here is the original ROM for reference. Is it possible to "fix" the ROM and put it back on the original chip?
[URL="https://drive.google.com/file/d/17lmUQQ2yislMWd1KfT7o-N9TUCwHjr7g/view?usp=sharing"]https://drive.google.com/file/d/17lm...ew?usp=sharing[/URL]

just saw your reply, will read donor chip now. This is from alibaba donor board 3536

title: [SOLVED]820-3536 chime with backlight but no image
message:
Here is donor ROM from alibaba 3536 board
[url]https://drive.google.com/file/d/1h6fZQmf1LzoX6cdKRg_opX5IKoPJmwfD/view?usp=sharing[/url]

title: [SOLVED]820-3536 chime with backlight but no image
message:
Try this one, not 100% sure it will work. Watch out that you don't change the "quad enable" bit. If you have a TL866 then uncheck the "flash status register" then the "quad enable" will remain untouched. EZP2010 is not able to change it so then don't worry.

[url]https://drive.google.com/open?id=1rF9sD2ritpkslx1SUnHF8hMuPlx68Dvk[/url]

title: [SOLVED]820-3536 chime with backlight but no image
message: Thank you, everything seems to be working as it should.
